title: SMC_Set_ETC_DCSyncSupervision (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_Set_ETC_DCSyncSupervision
This Function Block can be used to turn On/Off the DC Sync Supervision of an Ethercat axis.
By default it is set to true and the the state machine checks whether the
Distributed Clocks(DC) are in Sync every cycle.

rows.Name: bExecute
rows.Comment: TRUE: Enables the execution of the Function Block.

rows:
FALSE: Turns Off the DC Sync Supervision. By default it
is set to True

rows.Name: bDone
rows.Comment: The execution of the Function Block is finished

rows: TRUE: Error has occurred within the function block.
